name: IBM* Bluemix send temperature
description:
This project template includes the starting code needed to use the various sensors that come with the Grove Starter Kit. Update the temperature values and send the changes to IBM* Bluemix.

First steps:
Go to https://quickstart.internetofthings.ibmcloud.com/#/ and enter the MAC address or another name for the DEVICE ID. Replace the placeholder {DEVICE ID} for the DEVICE ID below in the client ID.
Run the example and check the results at:
https://quickstart.internetofthings.ibmcloud.com/#/device/{DEVICE ID}/sensor/ 

* Other names and brands may be claimed as the property of others.

hwreq: Grove LED (GroveLed) connected to the Grove Base Shield Port D3
Grove Temperature Sensor (GroveTemp) connected to the Grove Base Shield Port A0

additional_fields.name: Password
additional_fields.description: Password created during the device registration
